Detailed Description

A representation of an error encountered by the JREngage library.

Member Function Documentation

Getter for the mCode property.

Returns:
The error code

Getter for the mType property.

Returns:
The error type

Getter for the mMessage property.

Returns:
The human readable error message
Throwable getException ( )

Getter for the mCause property.

Returns:
The Throwable which precipitated the error
boolean hasException ( )
Returns:
True if the error was precipitated by an Exception

Variables

int mCode [private]

The integer code for the error, one of the constants defined in ConfigurationError, AuthenticationError, or SocialPublishingError

String mType [private]

A String representation of the type of error.

String mMessage [private]

A human readable message describing the error.

Throwable mCause [private]

A Throwable (frequently an IOException subtype) that precipitated the error.
